name: Slice 'n' Dice
description: Moving by dice roll is risky when one square out of place is the difference between life and death! In this table-top-style dungeon crawler, you'll need to be careful about every move to avoid the blood-thirsty creatures in your path. Go on a quest to rescure a mysterious maiden in Campaign mode, test you limits in Endless mode, or fully embrace the theme of randomness in the chaotic Rogue-Like mode. No matter which of these roads you go down, one thing's for sure - things are gonna get dicey!
